### Ahoy Geo Voyager, let’s explore the globe!
 Press A while pointing at the globe to spin it, and use the forward trigger while in Explore mode to drop a pin and learn more.

 Geo Voyage lets you challenge yourself with daily quizzes, discover historical events, and explore the world by asking the globe questions. You can even go VR Mode to immerse yourself in global travel.
